status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

ursabot commented on issue #5485: ARROW-6686: [CI] Pull and push docker images to speed up the nightly builds
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5485#issuecomment-535012826
 
 
   [AMD64 Conda Crossbow Submit (#65487)](https://ci.ursalabs.org/#builders/98/builds/108) builder has been succeeded.
   
   Revision: 2f8564fad25a1a0872220100db7f679689910faa
   
   Submitted crossbow builds: [ursa-labs/crossbow @ ursabot-232](https://github.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/branches/all?query=ursabot-232)

wesm commented on issue #5485: ARROW-6686: [CI] Pull and push docker images to speed up the nightly builds
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5485#issuecomment-535729929
 
 
   @kszucs @nealrichardson can you ensure that the process to modify these cached images is properly documented? I didn't see anything about that from scanning this. 
   
   Looks like there is a lint failure so I can't merge this yet 
   
   ```
   +pre-commit install
   pre-commit installed at .git/hooks/pre-commit
   +pre-commit run hadolint -a
   [WARNING] Unexpected key(s) present on git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-hooks: sha
   [INFO] Initializing environment for local.
   [INFO] Initializing environment for git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-hooks.
   Docker Format............................................................Failed
   hookid: hadolint
   ```
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
